name: Phyllotax
description:
Arrange icons, images, shapes, frames, or groups in Phyllotaxis ( leaf arrangement) patterns. Leaf arrangement pattern in sunflower, for example.

1. Select all the layers you want to arrange in a Phylotaxis Pattern. The more layers are, the better. 

2. Drag and adjust the spacing slider or enter a desired number in the spacing text field and hit enter.
